channel.title: Looking for medieval RTS game
channel.description:
I'm looking for a medieval-based RTS game, where you can build castles etc. A great example of what I'm looking for is Stronghold Legends. It absolutely must be 3D (Fully 3D, not "pseudo 3D", like Age of Mythology).
If possible, I would prefer that the majority of the game be castle/city building, with the ability to enter combat if I wish.
Can anyone help?

item.title: Looking for medieval RTS game
item.dc:creator: @Zach1188 Zach1188
item.description:
@Zach1188 wrote:

[quote=“eVokki`, post:6, topic:184123”][quote author=Zach1188 link=topic=245799.msg2073056#msg2073056 date=1203827549]
I used to play LOTR: BFME 2, but gave it up as it’s mostly combat, there’s no strong castle building elements.

Medieval: Total War looks very interesting, do you know whether or not you can build a castle? By that I mean construct stone walls etc.
[/quote]
You can upgrade the castles etc, you don’t build a fresh each time. You only need the castles if in a battle you wish to withdraw to the castle. ;D[/quote]
So I can’t construct my own walls etc.? I guess it’s not a big deal, but that’s what I was looking for. I’m “buying” Medieval 2: Total War right now, it’s about 97.3% purchased

Edit: I have been playing ME2: TW for a few days now, it really is an incredible game. It has so much depth, thanks for telling me about it, Jme.

Read full topic

item.title: Looking for medieval RTS game
item.dc:creator: @eVokki1 Cowie`
item.description:
@eVokki1 wrote:

[quote=“Zach1188, post:3, topic:184123”]I used to play LOTR: BFME 2, but gave it up as it’s mostly combat, there’s no strong castle building elements.

Medieval: Total War looks very interesting, do you know whether or not you can build a castle? By that I mean construct stone walls etc.[/quote]

You can upgrade the castles etc, you don’t build a fresh each time. You only need the castles if in a battle you wish to withdraw to the castle. ;D

Read full topic

item.title: Looking for medieval RTS game
item.dc:creator: @Zach1188 Zach1188
item.description:
@Zach1188 wrote:

On another topic

age of empires?

Not medieval, it’s colonial times if I’m not mistaken

TheBeanie:

Empire earth 1 and 2 are cracking games… Empire earth 3 is more unrealistic where-as 1-2 focus’s on real units

I looked at those, but the reviews are very poor.

I downloaded the demo for Medieval II: Total War, it’s amazing. The battles are far more realistic than most RTS games. Right now I’m downloading The Settlers: Rise of an Empire demo, I’ll see how it is.

Read full topic

item.description:
@Zach1188 wrote:

I used to play LOTR: BFME 2, but gave it up as it’s mostly combat, there’s no strong castle building elements.

Medieval: Total War looks very interesting, do you know whether or not you can build a castle? By that I mean construct stone walls etc.

item.title: Looking for medieval RTS game
item.dc:creator: @jme jme
item.description:
@jme wrote:

Well, I’m not so sure about the whole castle/city building, but have you played battle for middle earth 2? It’s a pretty fun game.

Also you could try Medieval: total war. I’ve only played rome: total war, but it was a great game and unique from most other RTS games. You take over cities/provinces/countries and build up a massive army through out the course of the game. It’s not a new battle from scratch every match. In the cities, you can buy and upgrade many different buildings, manage taxes, etc. Check it out.

Read full topic
